net.canarymod.api.entity.living

Interface LivingBase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnimalVehicle, ArmorStand, Bat, Blaze, CaveSpider, Chicken, Cow, Creeper, EnderDragon, Enderman, Endermite, EntityAnimal, EntityLiving, EntityMob, Ghast, GiantZombie, Golem, Guardian, Horse, Human, IronGolem, MagmaCube, Mooshroom, NonPlayableCharacter, Ocelot, Pig, PigZombie, Player, Rabbit, Sheep, Silverfish, Skeleton, Slime, Snowman, Spider, Squid, Tameable, Villager, Witch, Wither, Wolf, Zombie

    public interface LivingBase
extends Entity
    EntityLivingBase wrapper interface
    Author:
    Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Detail

      • getHealth

        float getHealth()
        Get this Entities health. May not work on entities that are not LivingEntity
        Returns:
        health

      • setHealth

        void setHealth(float health)
        Set this entities health. May not work on entities that are not LivingEntity
        Parameters:
        health - the health to be set

      • increaseHealth

        void increaseHealth(float health)
        Increase this entities health. This does not set but add the amount of health
        Parameters:
        health - to increase the health with (negative values decrease)

      • canSee

        boolean canSee(LivingBase entity)
        Check if this entity can see the provided entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - the LivingBase to check sight of
        Returns:
        true if the entity can see the provided entity (provided is not hidden); false otherwise

        Get this entities age. (Has nothing to do with the breeding stuff!! Use Ageable.getGrowingAge() instead!)
        Returns:
        age of the entity

      • setRevengeTarget

        void setRevengeTarget(LivingBase target)
        Set this Entities revenge target entity. Depending on entity type this must not necessarily be an attack target. Null to remove target
        Parameters:
        target - the LivingBase target or null to remove target

      • getRevengeTarget

        Get the current revenge target of this entity
        Returns:
        the revenge target or null if no target

        Parameters:
        entity - the LivingBase to set as last assailant

      • getTargetLookingAt

        Entity getTargetLookingAt()
        Gets the entity in this entity is looking at. with a default search radius of 64 blocks.
        Returns:
        The Entity in this entity is looking at or null if none in range.

      • getTargetLookingAt

        Entity getTargetLookingAt(int searchRadius)
        Gets the entity in this entity is looking at. with the given search radius from this entity.
        Parameters:
        searchRadius - search radius from this entity to search within
        Returns:
        The Entity in this entity is looking at or null if none in range.
